body.name: Cuisinart 722-24NS Chef's Classic Nonstick Stainless 10-Inch Open Skillet
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
features: Aluminum encapsulated base heats quickly and spreads heat evenly and eliminates hot spots
Titanium reinforced Quantanium nonstick interior for healthful low fat cooking options
Cool Grip handles are solid stainless steel riveted stick handles that stay cool on the stove top and provide a safe a solid grip
Rim is smoothly tapered to eliminate drips and spills while pouring
Stainless steel maintains its original brilliant finish with easy dishwasher cleanup
body.description: The kitchens of France were the inspiration behind our elegant Chef's Classic™ Stainless Cookware Collection, and the Nonstick Stainless 10-Inch Open Skillet is true to its spirit. We guarantee it with a lifetime warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cuisinart 722-24NS Chef's Classic Nonstick Stainless 10-Inch Open Skillet Our Chef's Classic Nonstick Stainless 10" Skillet features a sloped side and wide flat bottom for frying fish, sauteing onions and garlic, or browning big batches of chicken. The open design of the skillet maximizes the cooking surface and makes it easy to rearrange food as it is cooking, with handy measurement markings to keep an eye on the liquids. The pan is induction ready and boasts Quantanium nonstick interior is engineered for extreme durability. Mirror finish. Classic looks, professional performance.Aluminum encapsulated base heats quickly and spreads heat evenly. Eliminates hot spots.Quantanium nonstick interior for cooking with less fat.Measurement markings for ease of use.Drip-Free Pouring.Dishwasher Safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is our second set
reviews.reviewText: About six years ago, purchased four of these in different sizes. They have served faithfully and have been used almost daily. But despite cleaning them carefully and not using metal utensils, they eventually begin to lose their non-stick properties. So when replacement time came, we opted to get the exact same pans. That's how much we think of these.These pans have a fused aluminum bottom that keeps the pan absolutely flat on our cooktop surface. They eat evenly and are great pans. I don't understand why "designer" pans costing hundreds of dollars more can justify their prices, when these Cuisinart skillets are so well designed and manufactured.We don't do anything special maintaining them - use plastic utensils and limit metal scouring pads to the aluminum bottoms (not the sides - you don't want to scratch the polished exterior). A good 5 to 6 years with almost daily use is their life-span, which I understand is typical for a non-stick pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pan to replace the exact same model pan that I've had for many years. The old one still works well, but some of the non-stick coating is worn due to being treated poorly by a roommate. Anyhow, I consider this the perfect 10-inch frying pan. As with all nonstick pans, I suggest using utensils that won't scratch the bottom. Even so, the coating is very hard, and it takes a lot of misuse to mess it up. I've been using the old one for around 15 years, even with the misuse it got, which is pretty darn good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2019
reviews.reviewText: we just got it so I can't rate the durability of this particular pan. It works well and is easy to clean. The non-stick surface seems very hard so I think it will resist scratches. The bottom is thickened so it seems to distribute heat well. We already had a smaller size pan of the same design by Cuisinart that we've had for a few years. It has held up well and works well so we reasoned the larger size would also. So far we like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Extra thick base does not warp.
reviews.reviewText: Finally a decent priced pan that does not warp! After a few months, it’s holding up better than expected.Don’t read too much not the coating issues. These newer ‘non-stick’ coatings are not like it used to be and that is a good thing. The old school stuff had a bit more carcinogens in the coating that made them slick.I normally use a well seasoned cast iron skillet so I manage the utility of the pan like it should be. Season as directed - use high quality oils with the right heat range such as safflower or grape seed oil and it works fine, cleans up decent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oven and sticking proof
reviews.reviewText: This pain is the 10” version of my smaller skillet which I use for cornbread. The other lids in my set fit this skillet perfectly. I wanted it for a special breakfast and the shipping time was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice 10 inch Fry pan, although?
reviews.reviewText: This is a 10 inch Cuisinart frypan. I had the 8 inch for quite a while now and love it. Needed a 10 inch one, so I ordered the 10 inch, but discovered upon arrival 10 inch means outside dimension top and 8 inch inside bottom. Guess this is really 8” Fry pan not 10 unusable surface. Appears to be downgraded saying 10 inch but really 8 inch usable bottom space! 🤔

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have the smaller one and loved it. Love the weight!
Una verdadera maravilla .... y el cromo de primera ... osea una sarten de chef profesional .... super ok

I've only had this for a couple of weeks but so far, so great! Seems sturdy but is light and easy to handle! Always important for me for pans to be able to go from stovetop to oven and this one does the trick!
No se le pega nada, se ve muy bonito y me permitió cocinar los mejores omelettes de la vida. Recomendable 100%

Purchased the Cuisinart non-stick wok a few years ago and was very pleased with its performance. This skillet is the same construction as the wok (asked Cuisinart for a skillet version) and so far I am extremely pleased with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente sartenes, solamente hay que cuidar la temperatura.
reviews.reviewText: Me encantaron los sartenes, ya tengo mucho tiempo usándolos y al día de hoy funcionan perfecto. Le puse 4 estrellas porque el teflón se ralla ligeramente a pesar de que he utilizado solamente utensilios de plástico o madera, pero nada para preocuparse. La cubierta antiadherente al día de hoy funciona muy bien, pero si hay que cuidar mucho la temperatura, no se puede usar arriba de fuego medio.
